column5: This unique course covers a wide range of applications focused on aerospace computational aspects. Within the next five years there will be a demand for engineers and leaders who will be using 100% digital techniques for aerospace applications, design and testing.Who is it for?With its blend of skills-based and subject-specific material this course aims to provide students with generic practical skills and cutting-edge knowledge adaptable to the wide variety of applications in the field of aerospace computational engineering.The part-time option is suitable for qualified engineers to extend their knowledge and incorporate CFD into their skill set.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
